code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./ModelDetails.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ModelDetails=_ref=>{let{model,onDeselect,onConfirm}=_ref;const[selectedAttributes,setSelectedAttributes]=useState({});const handleAttributeSelect=(attribute,value)=>{setSelectedAttributes(prevState=>({...prevState,[attribute]:prevState[attribute]===value?null:value}));};const isAttributesSelected=()=>{const attributeKeys=Object.keys(model.additionalAttribute);return attributeKeys.every(attr=>selectedAttributes[attr]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"model-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Options"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["For ",model.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex flex-wrap",children:Object.keys(model.additionalAttribute).map(attr=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-4 detailItem",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:attr}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"attribute-options",children:model.additionalAttribute[attr].map(option=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"attribute-option ".concat(selectedAttributes[attr]===option?'selected':''),onClick:()=>handleAttributeSelect(attr,option),children:option},option))})]},attr))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onDeselect,children:"Back"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onConfirm,disabled:!isAttributesSelected(),children:"Confirm"})]});};export default ModelDetails;
